about_the_game:
Tired of serious gameplay? Or just want to check out all the features and corners of the game? Expand the limits of the possibilities of comfortable gaming with this small add-on that gives you unusual possibilities:
- Use the 9 rule sections and 19 rules to customise the game to your liking!
- Unlock the ability to make important game decisions with friends while playing on the same computer (or in streaming play)!
- Challenge yourself in three new modes of increased difficulty!
- Long-awaited window with tools, which many may call "cheats"!
- 5 new achievements!
- And lots and lots of fun situations, like politicians changing politicians every 5 years or foreign policy randomness!

Enjoy the game, good friend!
